instruction: Input a song title and generate a suitable song lyric.
output:
Verse 1:
I was lost in a spell, nowhere to be found
The darkness crept in, it would not turn around
Wanting to run, but my legs wouldn't move
It felt like a dark night of the soul

Chorus:
Lost in a place, no one had been before
My heart was aching, there was no one at the door
Cold and alone, feeling so small
It was a dark night of the soul

Verse 2:
Pulling me down and telling me lies
The shadows of doubt filled me with cries
Searching for hope, but feeling so low
It was a dark night of the soul

Chorus:
Lost in a place, no one had been before
My heart was aching, there was no one at the door
Cold and alone, feeling so small
It was a dark night of the soul

Bridge:
I could hear the echoes of the past
Voices ringing in the air
Remembering all the struggles I've faced
Slipping away into despair

Chorus:
Lost in a place, no one had been before
My heart was aching, there was no one at the door
Cold and alone, feeling so small
It was a dark night of the soul
